pt.pa.model

Class DatasetReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.pa.model.DatasetReader

  • public class DatasetReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves to read/access the Dataset

    • Method Detail

      • readNameFile

        public java.lang.String[] readNameFile(java.lang.String filepath,
                                       int size)
                                throws Alerts
        This method reads the file name of our Dataset
        Parameters:
        filepath - String variable which contains the filepath to read the name.txt
        size - Size of the Array of Strings which will store all the names of each future vertex's Hub
        Returns:
        returns an array of Strings which will contain all the names
        Throws:
        Alerts - - an Exception which will alert the user of the file isn't found

      • readWeightFile

        public int[] readWeightFile(java.lang.String filepath,
                            int size)
                     throws Alerts
        This method reads the Weight file of the Dataset
        Parameters:
        filepath - String variable which contains the filepath to read the weight.txt
        size - Size of the Array of ints which will store all the weights of each future vertex's Hub
        Returns:
        returns an array of ints which will contain all the weights in the text file
        Throws:
        Alerts - - an Exception which will alert the user of the file isn't found

      • readXY

        public Positions[] readXY(java.lang.String filepath,
                          int size)
                   throws Alerts
        This method reads the xy file of the Dataset
        Parameters:
        filepath - String variable which contains the filepath to read the xy.txt
        size - Size of the Array of ints which will store all the Positions of each future vertex's Hub
        Returns:
        returns an Array of Positions containing all the positions of the vertexes
        Throws:
        Alerts - - an Exception which will alert the user of the file isn't found

      • readRoutesFile

        public int[][] readRoutesFile(java.lang.String filepath,
                              int size)
                       throws Alerts
        This method reads the Route file of the Dataset
        Parameters:
        filepath - String variable which contains the filepath to read the Route.txt
        size - Size of the Array of ints which will store all the routes of each future vertex's Hub
        Returns:
        returns a bi-dimensional Array of ints containing all the connections/distances between the vertexes
        Throws:
        Alerts - - an Exception which will alert the user of the file isn't found
